transcript:
so how do you deal with haters on social
media it's important to realize this a
hater does not hate you a hater hates
themselves and the hate that you're
feeling from them is the hate they feel
for themselves projected onto you and so
when you're trying to do something
amazing and maybe put motivational
content on social media or Fitness
content on social media and you're
getting haters what they're doing is
they're seeing how great you're doing
and they're hating themselves for not
doing as well as you and so you have to
realize hurt people hurt people if
somebody's trying to hurt you it's
showing you that they're really just
hurting deep down inside don't allow
somebody that's hurting deep down inside
to stop you from following your true
passion
